check.label: Show fields
check.vc: mfShowFields=1 if(overlayMode=3) then vpLayout('overlayMode','align') else repaint endif
check.vc2: mfShowFields=0 if(overlayMode=3) then vpLayout('overlayMode','align') else repaint endif

toggle.label: Overlay viewports
toggle.vc: if(wysiwyg='y') then wysiwyg='n' endif if jvpinfo<>'align' then jvpinfo='align' endif vpLayout('overlayMode','overlay')

group.show: if(overlayMode>0.5 and jvpinfo='stack') then $SHOW=1 else $SHOW=-1 endif
if(overlayMode>0.5 and jvpinfo='align') then $SHOW=1 else $SHOW=-1 endif

entry.vc: mf_numcont=$VALUE graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
mf_contmult=$VALUE graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif

check.label: Positive contour
check.vc: mf_color_pos=1 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
check.vc2: mf_color_pos=0 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif

check.label: Negative contour
check.vc: mf_color_neg=1 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
check.vc2: mf_color_neg=0 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif

check.label: Multi color contours
check.vc: colorMode=0 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
check.vc2: colorMode=1 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif

group.show: if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=1) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=1) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=2) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=2) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=3) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=3) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=4) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=4) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=5) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=5) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=6) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=6) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=7) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=7) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=8) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=8) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=9) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif
if (colorMode=1 and jviewport=9) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=-1 endif

check.label: Negative contour
check.vc: mf_color_neg=1 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
check.vc2: mf_color_neg=0 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif

entry.vc: mf_numcont=$VALUE graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
mf_contmult=$VALUE graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif

check.label: Positive contour
check.vc: mf_color_pos=1 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
check.vc2: mf_color_pos=0 graphis:$s strstr($s,'con'):$n if($n>1) then dconi(`dpcon`) endif
